dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3825541M] Abuse of copyrights
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, April 11, 2007 2:31 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3825541M] Abuse of copyrights ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Abuse of copyrights Added by system at Wednesday, Apr 11 2007 07:28 pm X-MailFrom: kulbir@musicwaves.ca X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Apr 11 19:28:44 2007 Received: (qmail 21910 invoked by alias); 12 Apr 2007 00:28:44 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 21907 invoked from network); 12 Apr 2007 00:28:44 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 12 Apr 2007 00:28:44 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 11 Apr 2007 19:28:44 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 11 Apr 2007 19:28:44 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from kulbir@musicwaves.ca) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HbnB6-0005NV-5o for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 11 Apr 2007 19:28:44 -0500 Received: from mout.perfora.net ([217.160.230.40]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from kulbir@musicwaves.ca) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HbnAu-000CYr-Aa for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 11 Apr 2007 19:28:32 -0500 Received: from [142.179.95.90] (helo=sys102568) by mrelay.perfora.net (node=mrelayus1) with ESMTP (Nemesis), id 0MKp2t-1HbnAo2rCq-0008U2; Wed, 11 Apr 2007 20:28:29 -0400 From: "Kulbir Multani" To: Cc: Subject: Abuse of copyrights Date: Wed, 11 Apr 2007 17:28:13 -0700 Message-ID: <01ca01c77c99$77ba7f60$672f7e20$@ca> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_01CB_01C77C5E.CB5BA760" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 12.0 Thread-Index: Acd8mXKRcNnYOTQwQsiBferJaUSx1A== Content-Language: en-us X-Provags-ID: V01U2FsdGVkX18C8Anp8Mqf0w9sUoKW6JwUPoVCBDMmoPpEUYn 8P5TIokSGpOhIdFA7mwLBLPEaOBKCLe735TgabnljqaliuRPGF T69VFRAlBRaYWJdjWnpAA== X-OriginalArrivalTime: 12 Apr 2007 00:28:44.0466 (UTC) FILETIME=[87456120:01C77C99] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multipart message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Hi There, We have had issues with the domain pz10.com for quite some time now and we contacted them quite a few times with our grievances about taking our copyrighted music tracks off from their site but got little co-operation with them. We had numerous of our copyrighted cd's illegally made available on their site for download and they also charge an amount from their clients to download these tracks, which is direct violation of our copyrights. We are emailing you regarding this issue because they are using your servers to carry out these activities. We would appreciate if action is taken against these culprits. We are hereby warning these people through your company that if within 24 hours they don't take all Music Waves Productions copyrighted CD's from their site then we will be compelled to take necessary legal action against them. Thank you. Regards, Kulbir Multani Music Waves Productions Ltd. Unit#6 8311 129th Street Surrey BC V3W 0A6 Tel: 604-599-6962 Fax: 604-599-6063 Website: www.musicwaves.ca Email: info@musicwaves.ca MIME element (text/html)

Hi There,

 

We have had issues with the domain pz10.com for quite some time now and we contacted them quite a few times with our grievances about taking our copyrighted music tracks off from their site but got little co-operation with them. We had numerous of our copyrighted cd’s illegally made available on their site for download and they also charge an amount from their clients to download these tracks, which is direct violation of our copyrights. We are emailing you regarding this issue because they are using your servers to carry out these activities. We would appreciate if action is taken against these culprits. We are hereby warning these people through your company that if within 24 hours they don’t take all Music Waves Productions copyrighted CD’s from their site then we will be compelled to take necessary legal action against them.

 

Thank you.

 

Regards,

 

Kul bir Multani

Music Waves Productions Ltd.

Unit#6 8311 129th Street

Surrey BC V3W 0A6

Tel: 604-599-6962

Fax: 604-599-6063

Website: www.musicwaves.ca

Email: info@musicwaves.ca

MIME element (text/plain)
